name: implausibility
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being unlikely or difficult to believe, or something that is unlikely or difficult to believe: The main problem with the film is its implausibility. The game's cheeky implausibilities include a car racing across the face of a high-rise building. See
implausible
More examplesFewer examplesMaybe scientific data will convince you of the implausibility of these home remedies.It's best not to think about the story's many contradictions and implausibilities. His statement was all contradiction and implausibility.
